Container.Name: Core-Keeper-Dedicated-Server
Container.Overview:
Docker file for the new Core Keeper dedicated server running from SteamCMD. (Not account etc needed)
If your files do not load please check https://github.com/escapingnetwork/core-keeper-dedicated/issues/5

Config.Name: Server files
Config.Description: Path to server files, not required

Config.Name: WORLD_NAME
Config.Description: The name you wish to give to your server and its associated world

Config.Name: WORLD_SEED
Config.Description: The seed to use for a new world. Set to 0 to generate random seed.

Config.Name: MAX_PLAYERS
Config.Description: Maximum number of players that will be allowed to connect to server.

Config.Name: GAME_ID
Config.Description: Game ID to use for the server. Need to be at least 23 characters and alphanumeric, excluding Y,y,x,0,O. Empty or not valid means a new ID will be generated at start.

Config.Name: DATA_PATH
